normalized: the marketplace is packed to the gills.
it's all onlookers clamoring for a peek at the duel.
shootouts and knife fights aren't all that uncommon, but a duel's a different story.
especially this early in the morning, and right in the middle of the marketplace to boot.
this is a first for me, too.
there's an opening in the center of the mighty throng.
the ones responsible for all this commotion are probably in there.
not that i can tell from way back here, though.

name: annerose
normalized: gotta say, the people here really dig this stuff, don't they?

name: mayfeng
normalized: and you don't, annerose?

name: annerose
normalized: i don't hear you denying it either.

name: mayfeng
normalized: i never said that i didn't.
still, there're so many people here… move, i can't see.

name: onlooker
normalized: haah!?
the hell're you on about?
no cuts allowed youlittl--"

name: mayfeng
normalized: move.

name: onlooker
normalized: wh-white snake… er, miss mayfeng, beggin' your pard-- th-th… the steel witch!?

normalized: who th-!?

normalized: ouch, goddammit watch where you-- whaa!?
e-everybody move!
make way!
h-hurry!

name: rikurou
normalized: haha…"
like moses parting the red sea, a path opens in the packed crowd in the blink of an eye.
this is the almighty power of amidahara's twin lionesses.
they proceed to the front of the crowd wearing expressions like it was a matter of course.
i'm a little taken aback myself, but nevertheless follow them to our new front-row seats.

name: mayfeng
normalized: oh?
they're both using swords.

name: annerose
normalized: huh, that's a nice surprise.
they trade comments while sizing up the two fighters.
i peer out from behind them.
there are two men facing off over there.
one's a bald samurai.
i know this becuase of the aura that says he can't be anything else from the moment i laid eyes on him.
his right eye gleams sharply like a hawk's.
his left one is covered with a sword guard eyepatch like jubei yagyu.
he looks to be around forty, and though he though he isn'tas tall as me, i'd call him hard and tough like a stump over short.
he's got on a tattered kimono and straw sandals on his feet, with a matching set of long and short swords at his waist, the bells strung to them dangling soundlessly.
he honestly looks like he's jumped straight out of someperiod film.
the samurai hasn't even touched his swords, yet betrays not the slightest opening as he quietly regards the man before him.
the one who's already armed, screaming "draw!
" at the top of his lungs.
big.
he's gotta be at least 2 meters tall.
huge up and across, and fitting for that giant body is the massive sword slung on his back.
not to mention that scary face.
an old scar runs a straight line across his harder than steel forehead, and piercing eyes sit beneath his shaven--
wait, whaat!?
eh!?
eehh!?
wasn't this guy supposed to have been killed by--

name: rikurou
normalized: annerose!
i-it's him!
flabbergasted, i tug at annerose's sleeve.

name: annerose
normalized: ahn?
what's all the shouting about?

name: rikurou
normalized: it's him!
it's that big guy!

name: annerose
normalized: what?
someone you know?

name: rikurou
normalized: wait… annerose, you don't remember him!?

name: annerose
normalized: never seen him in my life.

name: rikurou
normalized: what are you talking about!?
you guys fought on the night we first met!
i point at the giant -- the man annerose fought one on one on that night long ago.
he turned into a minotaur demon right in front of us and was cut down by annerose -- or should've been.

name: annerose
normalized: who did?

name: rikurou
normalized: you did!

name: annerose
normalized: huh?
i did?
she's drawing a blank.
does she seriously not remember?
that giant, if i remember right his name was… that's it!
abou!
his name was abou!

name: rikurou
normalized: it's abou, remember?
he turned into a bull monster and you were all 'wachachacha!
' and sliced him to pieces and finished him off with a kick to the head!

name: annerose
normalized: is that what happened?
i forgot all about it.

name: rikurou
normalized: how the hell do you forget about somebody you killed with your own two hands!?
i accidentally get a bit more forward than i want out of agitation.

name: annerose
normalized: enough already.
he looks as healthy as a horse for apparently getting turned to ground beef.

name: rikurou
normalized: i mean… i know it's weird, b-but just look at him.

do you really not remember?

name: annerose
normalized: you sure it's not just coincidence?
what's the look for…?
well, excuse me for being so forgetful.

name: mayfeng
normalized: heh heh heh, what a sweetheart, forgetting even the men you've killed…"
mayfeng looks like she's enjoying this.

normalized: it's not like i can remember every single one.

normalized: so you'd think.

name: annerose
normalized: it sure sounds that way.
you looking for revenge?

but the corners of her eyes are twitching like she's pissed.
noticing that, the crowd quickly backs away from her.

name: abou (the younger)
normalized: hyaahahaha!
this is rich!

normalized: finding the rotten bastard that killed my bro right after i get to this shithole of a town, if that ain't lucky i don't know what is!
haw haw haw!

like two peas in a pod.

normalized: …nope.

ring.

samurai.
